SCRIPT.MSCRI: if grep -iq "Windows" "&UC4RB_OUTPUT_LOG#" then : SET &FLAG#="1" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_RESTART_APP_PREPARE_WIN_CMD : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = "&UC4RB_CMD_WIN#" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_NAME# = "/cmd2-&$RUNID#.ps1" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH2#=&UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : PRINT "Command Executed: &UC4RB_CMD_WIN#" sed -i "s/\$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD/$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD/" &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH2# : SET &UC4RB_EXE_FILE_CMD#='"powershell tempdir-&$RUNID#\cmd2-&$RUNID#.ps1"' : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_COPY_CMD@UNIX else : SET &FLAG#="1" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_RESTART_APP_PREPARE_UNIX_CMD : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = "&UC4RB_CMD_UNX#" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_NAME# = "/cmd3-&$RUNID#.sh" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH3#=&UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : PRINT "Command Executed: &UC4RB_CMD_UNX#" sed -i "s/\$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD/$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD/" &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH3# : SET &UC4RB_EXE_FILE_CMD#='"sed -i ' : SET &UC4RB_EXE_FILE_CMD#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_EXE_FILE_CMD#," 's/\r$//' tempdir-&$RUNID#/cmd3-&$RUNID#.sh ; sh tempdir-&$RUNID#/cmd3-&$RUNID#.sh") : SET &UC4RB_EXE_FILE_CMD#=STR_CAT(&UC4RB_EXE_FILE_CMD#,'"') : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_COPY_CMD@WIN fi
